content_en:
ЁЯСС
Greatest Emperor

Rajaraja I (Arulmozhi Varman) was one of the greatest emperors of the Chola dynasty. He expanded the empire by conquering the Cheras, Pandyas, and northern Sri Lanka. He assumed the title 'Mummadi Chola'.

тЪУ
Navy and Trade

He formed a powerful navy and conquered the Maldives islands. This was the first time in Indian history that a ruler used a navy to control territories across the sea.

ЁЯПЫя╕П
Brihadeeswara Temple

In 1010 CE, he completed the construction of the famous Rajarajeswaram (Brihadeeswara Temple) in Thanjavur. This UNESCO World Heritage site is an excellent example of Dravidian architecture.
